sayings.content: Music is the language of the soul.
sayings.author: Plato

sayings.content: Without music, life would be a mistake.
sayings.author: Nietzsche

sayings.content: Music washes away from the soul the dust of everyday life.
sayings.author: Beethoven

sayings.content: Music is the divine way to tell beautiful, poetic things to the heart.
sayings.author: Pablo Casals

sayings.content: Music is the strongest form of magic.
sayings.author: Marilyn Manson

sayings.content: Music is the soundtrack of your life.
sayings.author: Dick Clark

sayings.content: Music is the poetry of the air.
sayings.author: Jean Paul Richter

sayings.content: Music is the art which is most nigh to tears and memory.
sayings.author: Oscar Wilde

sayings.content: Music is the shorthand of emotion.
sayings.author: Leo Tolstoy

sayings.content: Music is the medicine of the mind.
sayings.author: John A. Logan

sayings.content: Music is the universal language of mankind.
sayings.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

sayings.content: Music is the wine that fills the cup of silence.
sayings.author: Robert Fripp

sayings.content: Music is the art of thinking with sounds.
sayings.author: Jules Combarieu

sayings.content: Music is the electrical soil in which the spirit lives, thinks and invents.
sayings.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

sayings.content: Music is the moonlight in the gloomy night of life.
sayings.author: Jean Paul

sayings.content: Music is the arithmetic of sounds as optics is the geometry of light.
sayings.author: Claude Debussy

sayings.content: Music is the movement of sound to reach the soul for the education of its virtue.
sayings.author: Plato

sayings.content: Music is the harmonious voice of creation; an echo of the invisible world.
sayings.author: Giuseppe Mazzini

sayings.content: Music is the wine which inspires one to new generative processes.
sayings.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

sayings.content: Music is the great uniter. An incredible force. Something that people who differ on everything and anything else can have in common.
sayings.author: Sara Bareilles

sayings.content: Music is the art which can most nimbly stir the soul's deepest recesses.
sayings.author: Quintilian

sayings.content: Music is the mediator between the spiritual and the sensual life.
sayings.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

sayings.content: Music is the art of the prophets, the only art that can calm the agitations of the soul.
sayings.author: Martin Luther

sayings.content: Music is the key to the female heart.
sayings.author: Johann G. Seume

sayings.content: Music is the poetry of sound, and poetry is the music of words.
sayings.author: Unknown

sayings.content: Music is the voice that tells us that the human race is greater than it knows.
sayings.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

sayings.content: Music is the art of the invisible.
sayings.author: Pierre Boulez

sayings.content: Music is the silence between the notes.
sayings.author: Claude Debussy

sayings.content: Music is the cup that holds the wine of silence.
sayings.author: Robert Fripp

sayings.content: Music is the sound wave of emotion.
sayings.author: Plato

sayings.content: Music is the light that shines when words fail.
sayings.author: Unknown

sayings.content: Music is the bridge between heaven and earth.
sayings.author: Maya Angelou

sayings.content: Music is the voice of the universe speaking to the human heart.
sayings.author: Unknown
